rows.label: campfev11_3650_msg0005
rows.name:
The evacuation preparations
for the Iiran people are
almost complete.

rows.label: campfev11_3650_msg0006
rows.name:
Thanks to Laura and her friends,
we have fewer problems now.

rows.label: campfev11_3650_msg0007
rows.name:
It feels like the time for
the final battle is drawing near.

rows.label: campfev11_3650_msg0009
rows.name:
Metsu isn't going to just sit
around and wait for us forever.

rows.label: campfev11_3650_msg0010
rows.name: He might already be losing his patience.

rows.label: campfev11_3650_msg0011
rows.name:
So you're saying it's time
to prepare ourselves.

rows.label: campfev11_3650_msg0012
rows.name:
His Majesty and the others were
talking about heading back
to the capital for now.

rows.label: campfev11_3650_msg0013
rows.name: Then let's get a move on.
